channel.title: Open-Source on Learn, Converse, Share
channel.description: Recent content in Open-Source on Learn, Converse, Share

item.title: GitHub Contribute URL
item.description: I sometimes get asked what is the best way to contribute to an open-source project. If the project is hosted on GitHub, there is a helper URL for each repository that will highlight any issues that the maintainers have labelled with good first issue or help wanted. that URL is /contribute on the the end of the repository URL. For example, the URL for the github.com/jmeridth/jmeridth.github.io repository is https://github.com/jmeridth/jmeridth.github.io/contribute You can search multiple repositories with GitHub’s new https://forgoodfirstissue.
